document_data.name: Wyshbryn Saldar
document_data.mainbody: a wererat, Wyshbryn had black fur.
document_data.Description: As a wererat, Wyshbryn had black fur.
document_data.History: Wyshbryn lived in Wheloon Prison with his fellow Riverside Rats until they were forced from their hideout by the [[Night Brigade]] under [[Storna Harnwood]], who turned it into a [[Temple of Shar (Wheloon)|Temple of Shar]]. After being driven outside the prison, Wyshbryn spied on the Night Brigade's foul Grand Arcanist [[Darstil Vurusk]], who performed horrible experiments upon helpless prisoners, and eventually sent an attack to kill him and end his madness.
